thread.title: Great location, great room and very friendly reception
thread.title_full: Great location, great room and very friendly reception - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: ZRHGlobetrotter
title: Great location, great room and very friendly reception
text: Hotel Artemide is centrally located. The rooms were clean, comfortable and stylishly decorated. What we really found exceptional, though, was the very friendly reception and porters. They really made you feel welcome and were very helpful. We will definitely stay at this hotel again the next time we visit Rome.
